level.heading: Application to existing domestic corporations.
level.text: Except as otherwise provided by § 29-107.01, this chapter shall apply to all domestic corporations in existence on its effective date that were incorporated under any general statute of the District providing for incorporation of corporations for profit.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 added "Except as otherwise provided by § 29-107.01."

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
